00027 #ifndef __LIGHT_H__
00028 #define __LIGHT_H__
00029 
00030 #include "omega/osystem.h"
00031 #include "omega/Color.h"
00032 //#include "omega/scene/RenderPass.h"
00033 
00034 namespace omega
00035 {
00036 namespace scene
00037 {
00038         class Light: public DynamicObject
00039         {
00040         public:
00041                 enum Type { Point, Directional, Spot };
00042 
00043         public:
00044                 Light():
00045                         myPosition(0, 0, 0),
00046                         myColor(1, 1, 1),
00047                         myType(Point),
00048                         myEnabled(false) {}
00049                         
00050                 const Vector3f& getPosition() { return myPosition; }
00051                 void setPosition(const Vector3f& value) { myPosition = value; }
00052 
00053                 const Color& getColor() { return myColor; }
00054                 void setColor(const Color& value) { myColor = value; }
00055 
00056                 Type getType() { return myType; }
00057                 void setType(Type value) { myType = value; }
00058 
00059                 bool isEnabled() { return myEnabled; }
00060                 void setEnabled(bool value) { myEnabled = value; }
00061 
00062         private:
00063                 Vector3f myPosition;
00064                 Color myColor;
00065                 Type myType;
00066                 bool myEnabled;
00067         };
00068 };
00069 }; // namespace omega
